HOTSPOT -

NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.
Hot Area:
//IMG//

discussion.content: Correct

https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/services/virtual-desktop/
Answer is D

The solution that meets the requirement of enabling employees to access custom applications from their personal laptops while working from home is D. Windows Virtual Desktop. 

Windows Virtual Desktop allows users to access a virtual desktop environment hosted in the cloud, which includes the custom applications they need to work with. This ensures that employees can work remotely without needing to install custom applications on their personal laptops, which can pose security risks. 

The other options listed (Microsoft Access, Power Virtual Agent, Microsoft Remote Assist, and Microsoft Teams) do not provide the same level of access to custom applications as Windows Virtual Desktop.

We recommend Current Channel, because it provides your users with the newest Office features as soon as they're ready. If you need additional predictability of when these new Office features are released each month, we recommend Monthly Enterprise Channel. In those cases where you've select devices that require extensive testing before receiving new features, we recommend Semi-Annual Enterprise Channel.

questions.question_text:
Your company has a Microsoft Office 365 subscription.
As an administrator for this subscription, you are educating users on which component to use to register their personal home device with the company.
Which of the following is the component that should be used?

discussion.content: B for sure
When you come across these kinds of question, just use pure logic. Teams and Yammer are really not the point here. Same goes for Azure AD Identity Protection.

Enterprise Mobility + Security (EMS) is a mobility management and security platform that includes services such as Azure Active Directory (Azure AD), Microsoft Intune, Azure Information Protection and Microsoft Advanced Threat Analytics
